meanings: Interjection oh no, what the heck (→이런2, 그런2)

vlive.korean: 저런건 무조건 읽어줘야지. I should always read comments like this. 듣기 View video HAPPYFACE : [Dalshabet] 수빈 '이 곳' 회사 근처에서 생방

vlive.english: Is the bat supposed to be like that, everyone?

vlive.korean: 저런 걸로 좀 찍어줄래? - 어떤 거? Can you film that? - What? 듣기 View video V Beauty : [Yeonsun 연선] 서울패션위크 랭앤루 변혜정&박민선 디자이너 패션쇼 라이브 Seoul Fashion Week Lang&Lu Show

vlive.korean: 나도 저런 걸로 쓸 걸 그랬어. I should have written with that pen too. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] PENTAGON X Happiness Train - 펜타곤​​의 행복행!
